content.rendered:
There are various terms for describing people with varying degrees or kinds of deafness. The most important and common terms are shown above. It can be a matter of personal preference, a cultural thing, and/or a language choice. So, to avoid offending someone, it is best to ask what term/s they prefer.

For definitions and a guide for when to use each term, click on the links.

Download the Real Life Tips infographic.

More information:

  • Terminology for deafness
  • Describe people hearing loss | Deaf Children Australia
